name: Jumprei, escape from the ancient tech
name_original: Jumprei, escape from the ancient tech
description:
After being abandoned in boxes during years, a lot of ancient electronic devices and locked on an asylum as they are lossing their sanity.

Jumprei will try to keep his focus with hard work, painting all the walls of the seven main rooms of old building, as he avoids his old mates psychotic murder attempts.

Jumfrei is a remade of the Spectrum classic 'Humprey'. The main idea is let the player choose more actual mechanics, or instead be able to select all the old tricks those games had to offer their infamous difficulty.

Controls:

 Cursors/WASD/Gamepad to move.

Space/Enter/Gamepad to jump.

ESC/TAB/Select for pause.
